comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could this be "SAULSBURY, Willard, Jr., (son of Willard Saulsbury, Sr., nephew of Eli Saulsbury), a Senator from Delaware"? See bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=S000073 Face looks similar and DE and NJ are at least close!!!

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: We'll add this correction to the source catalog, with the caution of "probably" until more information turns up. Thanks!
